# A dark brown pill used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to eliminate phlegm and retained fluid in the treatment of accumulation of phlegm in the chest marked by dull chest pain aggravated by cough and difficulty in expectoration".

Kongxian pills have the following ingredients:
